io.storj

Class UplinkOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.storj.UplinkOption

  • public class UplinkOption
extends Object
    Options for configuring Uplink.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • maxInlineSize

        public static UplinkOption maxInlineSize(long maxInlineSize)
        Option for the maximum size of inline objects. The uplink will attempt to store a new object below this size in the satellite's metainfo. Objects at or below this size will be marked for inline storage, and objects above this size will not. (The satellite may reject the inline storage and require remote storage, still.)
        Parameters:
        maxInlineSize - the maximum inline size in bytes
        Returns:
        an UplinkOption

      • maxMemory

        public static UplinkOption maxMemory(long maxMemory)
        Option for the default maximum amount of memory to be allocated for read buffers while performing erasure decoding on the downloaded data. If set to zero, the library default (4 MiB) will be used. If set to a negative value, the system will use the smallest amount of memory possible.
        Parameters:
        maxMemory - the maximum memory for read buffers in bytes
        Returns:
        an UplinkOption

      • tempDir

        public static UplinkOption tempDir(String tempDir)
        Option for temp directory to be used during upload. If not set, OS temp directory will be used.
        Parameters:
        tempDir - path to temp directory
        Returns:
        an UplinkOption

      • skipPeerCAWhitelist

        public static UplinkOption skipPeerCAWhitelist(boolean skipPeerCAWhitelist)
        Option that determines whether to require all remote hosts to have identity certificates signed by Certificate Authorities in the default whitelist. If set to true, the whitelist will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        skipPeerCAWhitelist - set to true to ignore the whilelist, otherwise set to false
        Returns:
        an UplinkOption
